title: Many times when working with the canvas you will need to have a canvas to hold some intrum pixel data. It is easy to create an offscreen canvas, obtain a 2D context. An offscreen canvas will also use the available graphics hardware to render.

inline_content.Text: Many times when working with the canvas you will need to have a canvas to hold some intrum pixel data. It is easy to create an offscreen canvas, obtain a 2D context. An offscreen canvas will also use the available graphics hardware to render.

title: The following code simply creates a canvas and fills it with blue pixels.

inline_content.Text: The following code simply creates a canvas and fills it with blue pixels.

title: Many times the offscreen canvas will be used for many tasks, and you may have many canvases. To simplify the use of the canvas you can attach the canvas context to the canvas.

inline_content.Text: Many times the offscreen canvas will be used for many tasks, and you may have many canvases. To simplify the use of the canvas you can attach the canvas context to the canvas.
